title: Delivering Shiny!
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Hey, Mari-chan. Would you like to appear in a magazine with me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>What? What do you mean?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I was asked to bring a friend for my next magazine shoot. If you’d like to come, Mari-chan—<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Cool! Mari is so glad you want me to do such a cool thing, Karin! Mari is excited~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>You’re okay with it even though I haven’t told you the details?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Anything is fun with you, Karin. Mari could never refuse~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, you’re so reliable. Then, let’s practice posing right away, shall we?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Mari will be counting on you, then! Mari doesn’t do anything halfheartedly once she’s made up her mind!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I’m going to be tough on you, then. Get ready. ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I’ll strike a shiny pose that will pierce everyone’s hearts~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
